sentences.sContent: But it can also inspire and uplift and exalt, because power can be used to help people accomplish marvelous things.
sentences.sContent_eng: But it can also inspire and uplift and exalt, because power can be used to help people accomplish marvelous things.
sentences.sCn: 但是，权力也可以激励人、振奋人和提升人，因为它可以帮助人们成就非同寻常的事业。

remMethod.val: ex + alt(高) → 评价高 → 赞扬

words.tran: 得意洋洋，欣喜；提拔；举起
高举；赞扬；使激动（exalt的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to put someone or something into a high rank or position
